name: 心理語言學
comment: 教室位於雲和街大樓2樓（地址：雲和街1號），外系及外校學生需申請門禁權限。
goals: to stimulate creative research in psycholinguistics
to design experiments to test your hypotheses
syllabus:
\-Week 1: Presentation

\- Week 2-3: Linguistics, internal linguistics, and introduction to psycholinguistics. 

\- Weeks 4-6: Morphology, word processing, the mental lexicon, lexical access, priming. 

\- Weeks 7-11: Syntax, syntactic processing, sentence comprehension, ambiguity. 

\- Weeks 12-15: Phonology, sound perception, speech errors, categorical perception. 

\- Weeks 16-17: Review, term paper preparation, presentations.

\- Week 18: Term paper due

grading.note: Presentation on the topic chosen for the term paper

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
